alert.note: Alert for Coryell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 26 at 8:34AM CDT until October 27 at 7:09AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... North Bosque River Near Clifton affecting Bosque County. Cowhouse Creek Near Pidcoke affecting Coryell County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cowhouse Creek near Pidcoke. * WHEN...From this morning to tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:25 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 21.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 35.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23.7 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
